caption.p: Map showing geographic location of farms with SeACoV outbreaks. SeACoV was first isolated from clinically sick animals in commercial pig herds of Guangdong province of China in 2017. There were reports of reemergence in Fujian in 2018 and again in Guangdong in 2019. The right panel showed the outbreak of newborn-piglet diarrhea first occurred in four commercial pig farms (marked by yellow stars) in northern Guangdong in 2017.
